item.title: About
item.description: Iâ€™m a high school student studying software development, data science, systems administration, and other related stuff. What I do: Build, setup, and configure servers Install and configure networking equipment Manage hypervisors, and docker/k8s/rancher instances Create usable software Learn whatever technology is needed to complete a job In my free time, I also do satellite reception, 3D printing, and other nerd stuff that you will see here. Thanks for reading!
